(0,): As a system administrator, I want to set up database connections and models, so that the application can store and retrieve data efficiently As a report generator, I want to create D files with caching, so that duplicate processing can be avoided and reports are generated efficiently As a product manager, I want to track Tech Thursday issues, so that user feedback can be documented and addressed As a UX researcher, I want to schedule user testing sessions, so that product improvements can be validated with real users As a file requester, I want to retrieve D files via API, so that reports can be accessed programmatically
(2,): As a developer, I want to implement Redis caching for files, so that frequently accessed files can be retrieved faster As a content manager, I want to update submission publish status, so that content visibility can be controlled As a financial analyst, I want to manage GTAS windows, so that time-sensitive financial data can be processed within specific periods As a FABS submitter, I want to validate files via API, so that I can ensure my submissions meet requirements As a background task runner, I want to process historical FABS data, so that large datasets can be handled asynchronously
(1,): As a data analyst, I want to process deletion of old submissions, so that the database remains clean and performant As a data validator, I want to validate FABS files, so that data quality is maintained and errors are identified early As a security officer, I want to reset environment permissions, so that system access is properly restricted to staging environments As a data engineer, I want to derive funding agency codes, so that data consistency is maintained across records
